entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
